title: Multipurpose Elite Sorghum for Africa
findingsText: A new African south-south and north-south network of academic and research organisations, NGOs, government and stakeholder groups has been formed to coordinate Sorghum crop development for traits in addition to human food and to develop Sorghum products, including livestock forage, in sub-Saharan Africa. Network contacts available. Network will be expanded and open to new engagement. Agriculture, Food and Drink
